title: layer2ControlProtocol
description: An identification of a specific Layer 2 Control Protocol.

objectType.description: The type of the object, layer2ControlProtocol.

destinationAddress.description: The MAC Address used for the Layer 2 Control Protocol.

etherType.description: A two-octet field in an Ethernet frame used to indicate which protocol is encapsulated in the payload of the frame.

subtype.description: Subtype for Slow Protocols, in hexadecimal format.

protocolIdentifier.description: The id assigned by the Seller for the UNI for this SVLAN ID assignment.
